sections.heading: of trust property; notice of default; trustee or attorney for trustee; designate person to receive notices; when
sections.text: (1) The power of sale conferred in the Nebraska Trust Deeds Act upon the trustee shall not be exercised until:(a) The trustee or the attorney for the trustee shall first file for record i

sections.heading: provides a trustor the ability to cure a default on an obligation secured by a trust deed prior to a trustee's sale and have the trust deed reinstated
sections.text: While section 76-1012 contemplates and references the filing of a notice of default, it does not itself require the notice of default or specify the
